entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having a wand that conquered Voldemort's borrowed wand.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist, mentioned as being pursued by Harry across the skies.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: A wandmaker, mentioned as not anticipating or understanding the abilities of Harry's wand.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: A wandmaker, mentioned as possibly knowing secrets of wands that Ollivander does not.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: An international Quidditch player, mentioned as being attracted to Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: A relative of Harry's, mentioned as being seen with someone by Krum.

entities.name: voldemort's borrowed wand
entities.description: A wand that Voldemort used and was conquered by Harry's wand.

entities.name: harry's wand
entities.description: Harry's wand, which is able to conquer other wands.

relationships.description: Voldemort was pursued by Harry across the skies.
Harry's wand conquered Voldemort's borrowed wand.
Krum was attracted to Ginny, as mentioned by his comment about her being 'very nice-looking'.
